svg.text: SAGA PRYOR DATA CENTER - ELECTRICAL SINGLE LINE DIAGRAM
13.8kV Dual Ring MV Distribution - Detailed Breaker and Connection Layout
From BOD: 6x4MW Gen | 8x3.5MVA TX | 6 RMUs | Dual Ring Topology
1. Ring topology: Each RMU shows INCOMER and OUTGOER breakers with transformer feeder tee-off
2. Each LV-SWBD feeds 3 distribution panels: IT UPS loads, Mechanical UPS loads, and Lighting/Receptacles
3. All breaker positions shown at each connection point
4. Ring A (red) and Ring B (blue) operate independently for N path redundancy
5. Individual UPS modules shown: 5 IT UPS modules + 8 Mechanical UPS modules
